short_summary: Purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Parksville, BC
description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Parksville, BC by January 26, 2024.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title:** Parksville Office Reconfiguration
---------------------------------------

* **French title:** Reconfiguration des bureaux de Parksville
* **Contracting entity name (English):** Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
* **Contracting entity name (French):** L'Agence canadienne d'inspection des aliments (ACIA)
* **Contract number (English):** 2024-00327
* **Contract number (French):** 2024-00327

**Tender Details:**

* **Notice type (English):** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Notice type (French):** Demande de proposition découlant d’un arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement
* **Procurement method (English):** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Procurement method (French):** Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner
* **Evaluation criteria (English):** Lowest Price
* **Evaluation criteria (French):** Prix le plus bas
* **Delivery region (English):** Parksville, BC
* **Delivery region (French):** Parksville, C.-B
* **Contract duration (English):** From November 17, 2023 to March 31, 2024
* **Contract duration (French):** Du 17 novembre 2023 au 31 mars 2024

**Harmonized Commodity Description and Coding System (HSDDCS) Codes:**

* 24102000 - Shelving and storage
* 56101520 - Lockers
* 56101700 - Office furniture
* 72153606 - Office furniture installation or reconfiguration service

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

**Tender Documents:**

* Please refer to the attachments for all tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and the current floor plan.

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Catherine Clairoux
* **Email:** [catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** (343) 596-9265

**Closure:**

Please note that this tender has expired.

Let me know if there are any other government documentation you have that need to be rewritten in a more professional manner. I will write an official report to
